lead_paragraph: Southern Methodist scored 15 unanswered points in the fourth quarter to pull away from Alabama-Birmingham, 22-9, last night in Dallas. Justin Willis passed for 148 yards and a touchdown, and linebacker Tony Hawkins returned an interception for another score.
